### Missing: skin.sheet.title=Skin ### Missing: skin.sheet.properties=Skin Properties ### Missing: skin.sheet.deprecatedProperties=Deprecated properties ### Missing: skin.sheet.overriddenTemplates=Overridden templates ### Missing: skin.sheet.addTemplate=Add a new overriding template skin.sheet.add=Pridať ### Missing: skin.sheet.overrideTemplateWarning=This section allows you to override a template of the skin. This is technical and you should be aware of the consequences. ### Missing: skin.sheet.deprecatedPropertiesWarning=This section is here for retro-compatibility reasons. You should use the 'overridden templates' mechanism above. ### Missing: skin.sheet.nojs=Without JavaScript, you cannot use this section. But you can use the {0}Object Editor{1} instead, and manually add {2} objects.
### Missing: skin.sheet.js.deleting=Deleting... ### Missing: skin.sheet.js.deletingDone=The template has been deleted! ### Missing: skin.sheet.js.error.csrf=CSRF validation failed when saving. Refresh your browser to try again. ### Missing: skin.sheet.js.error.rights=Failed to save the skins because of insufficient permissions. ### Missing: skin.sheet.js.deleteConfirmationText=Are you sure you want to delete this template? skin.sheet.js.deleteConfirmationYes=Áno, vymažte to. ### Missing: skin.sheet.js.deleteConfirmationNo=No, cancel ### Missing: skin.sheet.js.adding=Adding... ### Missing: skin.sheet.js.addingDone=The template has been added!
